name: The Muted Ones
description:
THE MUTED ONES A music-infused platformer about hunting down the world's lost music and giving it back to the world!

----------------------------------------------------

Long ago, the world was filled with a bountiful variety of beautiful music. Once war broke out, however, the leaders of the world's musical genius were grief-stricken and heavily disheartened. They decided to make it their quest to rid the world of music, and stop anyone getting in their way, being dubbed by the opposition as the "Muted Ones". The frequencies in the air, where they were once joyful and melodic, are now starkly stagnant in their monotony, and the people yearn for music to soothe their souls once more.

Our hero, can you reclaim the world's music and give it back to the people of this world?

----------------------------------------------------

A game by Omar Bahlool, Yi Ding, Nathan Laureta, and James Pollard for the Spring 2022 ARTG 120 course at UC Santa Cruz.

Omar: Tilemaps and Background, Art

Yi: Player Art and Animations, Sprites, Art

Nathan: Coding and Art Implementation, Code Animations & Particle Effects

James: Music and Sound Design, Coding and Art Implementation

For inquiries, email jamespollard64@live.com
